name: aayuvedic_solutions
description: This is project on Aayurvedic solutions towards all possible diseases.

scripts.admin-build: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.client-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm run admin-build && npm run client-build
scripts.app-on-local: npm run admin-build-only && npm run client-build-only && heroku local

author: Kumar Utsav Singh and Shweta Singh
